content.question: Taken as a whole, Addingtonâ€™s report provides most direct evidence for which of the following trends in eighteenth-century England?

choices.label: Indifference to the plight of the rural poor among the landowning class
Controversy over the commercialization of agriculture
Widespread resistance to enclosure by residents of open-field villages
Shifts in political representation caused by population movements

content.answer: Controversy over the commercialization of agriculture

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
